district forecast


Monday and Tuesday Fine apart from local fog and frost early Tuesday morning. A cool to cold and partly cloudy day with light to moderate northwesterly winds.


Wednesday Fine and partly cloudy. A cool to cold day with light to moderate northwesterly winds.


Thursday Isolated showers, becoming scattered in the west. Local hail possible. Cold.


Friday Scattered showers. Possible local hail and thunder. Cold.

Issued Mon 15:31 EST
